description: ust Gelato - Gelato is generic word in Italian for 'Just Frozen' Just Gelato is born with a passion to create healthy desserts/desserts for good health.Gelato's are a definit Heathy and Tasty Alternative to Icecream. Natural italian icecream. They offer Mysore's best Italian gelato. It is unique, low in calories and fat, yet creamy. It is icecream for everyone.The fat content in gelato's is 3 times lesser than that of regular icecream. It is not a franchise but Mysore's own.
address: Just Gelato, No.2766, 6th Main, 8th Cross,V V Mohalla.
